# 10.0 Docs

## Globalization

- [Environment variable renamed to DOTNET_ICU_VERSION_OVERRIDE](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/globalization/10.0/version-override.md): Learn about the .NET 10 breaking change in globalization where the environment variable CLR_ICU_VERSION_OVERRIDE was renamed to DOTNET_ICU_VERSION_OVERRIDE.
